DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this case-referent study is to assess the impact of statins usage on the risk of having a first myocardial infarction (MI) in a real life situation in France
DOC.brief_title: Statins and Risk of Myocardial Infarction in Real Life in France
DOC.criteria: Patients can speak French or English Patients can be interviewed by telephone Place of usual residence in the area of recruitment Patients refusing to participate in the study Patients who cannot be reached by telephone Previous history of myocardial infarction
